data: .progress-dot.current .dot-inner: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite | .progress-dot.visited.animated .dot-inner: fillDot 0.4s ease-out forwards

.debug-panel: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95) | .debug-header: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) | .collapse-btn,
  .close-btn: none | .collapse-btn:hover,
  .close-btn:hover: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) | .state-display: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) | .scenario-btn: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) | .scenario-btn:hover: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2) | .scenario-btn:active: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) | .debug-content::-webkit-scrollbar-track: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) | .debug-content::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) | .debug-content::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)

.prompt-btn--default: var(--fg-text-primary-40) | .prompt-btn--default:hover:not(.prompt-btn--disabled): var(--fg-text-primary-60) | .prompt-btn--default:active:not(.prompt-btn--disabled): var(--fg-text-primary-20) | .prompt-btn--secondary: var(--border-secondary, var(--fg-text-primary-30)) | .prompt-btn--secondary:hover:not(.prompt-btn--disabled): var(--bg-primary)

.filter-toggle: inset 0 0px 0px 1px var(--bg-primary) | .filter-toggle:hover: inset 0 0px 0px 2px var(--bg-primary) | .filter-toggle.active: inset 0 0px 0px 4px var(--bg-primary) | .filter-toggle.active:hover: inset 0 0px 0px 2px var(--bg-primary)

.user-bubble: var(--fg-text-inverse) | .assistant-bubble: var(--fg-text-primary) | .message-time: var(--fg-text-primary) | .user-meta .message-time: var(--fg-text-primary) | .loading-bubble: var(--fg-text-primary) | .error-title: var(--error-text, #dc2626) | .error-details: var(--error-text-secondary, #7f1d1d)

.layout: inline-flex | .title: flex | .title::after: block | ul: flex | li: flex | li::before: inline-block
